column4: I have a friend who recently got a free old iMac.  I want him to use linux, but he has been resistant. he's willing to try it on this iMac.  will hoary ppc be high enough quality to win him over?
Have him use OS X Panther, it's BSD, it's just as good and it looks a hell of a lot nicer.
I'm telling you.. it's the best of both worlds
